basics.name: Aman Kumar
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: A recent graduate in Data Analytics from RMIT with a background in the hospitality industry offering strong team leadership, problem-solving, and communication skills. Familiar with Excel, SPSS, MySQL, Python and Tableau. Transitioning to data analytics, driven by a passion for using data insights to support decision-making and continuous learning.
